    Ulisse workflow 1: Pathway Cross-Talk analysis of bulk data Ulisse workflow 2: Cell-cell cross-talk analysis on single cell data

    Function reference

    All functions

    TM_CT()
    Function to calculate cross-talks between pathways of different gene communities
    calc_gs_perm()
    Internal function of pathtools
    calc_p()
    Estimation of p values
    calc_set_similarity()
    The function calculates similarities between two sets.
    comparing_results_network()
    Visual representation of multiple cross-talk analyses.
    cross_talk()
    Function to caluclate cross-talk
    ct_heatmap()
    Function to plot the heatmap of cross-talk results
    eFDR()
    empirical False Discovery Rate
    edge_weights()
    Function for the assignment of edges weights in order to better visualize the communities
    enrichment_map()
    Enrichment map
    es()
    Enrichment Score
    filter_gsl()
    Filter a gene set list
    find_communities()
    Find topological communities
    funct_rel_heatmap()
    Function to obtain a detailed visualization of specific results of functional relevance analysis
    gene_functional_relevance()
    Function to calculate gene functional relevance
    gene_set_cc()
    Function to calculate sub-components pathway score
    gs_cross_talk()
    Cross-talks between gene-sets
    gsea()
    Gene Sert Enrichment Analysis
    ora()
    Over Representation Analysis
    ora1gs()
    Hypergeometric test on 1 dataset
    ora2enrich()
    ora2enrich this function translates the result of an ORA into the DOSE class "enrichResult"
    ora_pipeline()
    ora pipeline
    pathway_data()
    Returns filtered msigdb geneset in a format compatible with cross-talks calculations
    pathway_sim_comm()
    Pathway similarity and communities
    pathway_similarity()
    Pathway similarity
    perm_link()
    Function to caluclate permutation of the number of links between two gene sets
    plot_functional_relevance()
    Function to plot functional relevance results
    plot_network_CT()
    Plot cross-talk results as a network
    plot_ora_comparison()
    Plot a comparion between two ORAs
    preparing_DEG_list()
    Function to prepare the input for `cluster_communication()` by using DEG analysis results data
    preparing_expr_list()
    Function to prepare cluster list for `cluster_communication()`
    preparing_gs_list()
    Build list for cross-talk calculation from database list
    preparing_msigdb_list()
    Build list for cross-talk calculation from MSigDB database list
    round()
    Scientific approximation

    Developed by Alice Chiodi, Ettore Mosca.
